section.p: This template represents the diagnosis or diagnoses discovered or confirmed during the procedure. They may be the same as preprocedure diagnoses or indications.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-16766, CONF:1198-16767, CONF:1198-32539 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.51"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Postprocedure Diagnosis template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.51)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-19151)/@code="59769-0" Postprocedure Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-19152, CONF:1198-32166)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8759, CONF:1198-8760, CONF:1198-15583)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Problem Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Postprocedure Diagnosis template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.51)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8756, R2.1=CONF:1198-8756)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8757, R2.1=CONF:1198-8757)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-19151)/@code="59769-0" Postprocedure Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-19152, CONF:1198-32166)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8759, CONF:1198-8760, CONF:1198-15583)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Problem Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)

body.codeblock: <act xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.51" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.51"/> <code code="59769-0" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Postprocedure Diagnosis"/> <text>Text Value</text> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor/> </author> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.113"/> <code code="75328-5" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Prognosis"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143"/> <code code="225773000" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="Preference"/> <text>Text Value</text> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> </author> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5"/> <code code="11323-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Health status"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.6"/> <code code="33999-4" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Status"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation> </entryRelationship> </act>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:16766, CONF:16767 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.51"
Consol Postprocedure Diagnosis SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8756, R2.1=CONF:1198-8756)
Consol Postprocedure Diagnosis SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8757, R2.1=CONF:1198-8757)
Consol Postprocedure Diagnosis SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="59769-0" Postprocedure Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:8758)

Consol Postprocedure Diagnosis SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8759, CONF:8760, CONF:15583) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
